thread.title: August Commercial Truck Market Performs Well
thread.title_full: August Commercial Truck Market Performs Well - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: August Commercial Truck Market Performs Well
text:
NADA Used Car Guide
MCLEAN, Va. , Sept. 14, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- In the September edition of their commercial truck Guidelines report, NADA Used Car Guide analysts found retail pricing stable for the month of August with a few exceptions. The analysts also provided a special section in the report, which addresses the question, "Is there a market for 6x2's within the commercial trucking industry?"
According to Chris Visser , senior analyst at ATD/NADA Official Commercial Truck Guide, "Retail sales volume recovered from an unusually low June, and wholesale volume remains strong. On average, month-over-month pricing in both channels saw little change."
Visser went on to say, "Medium duty conventionals had a better month, while cabovers remained stable."
The report includes a special study entitled, Is there a market for 6x2's? In the study, an analysis of the adoption-rate of the 6x2 tandem axle configuration is explored. Additionally, the study identifies the key technology challenges faced by the platform and the reasons for resistance by industry-wide stakeholders.
Download the Free Report
The full 2015 September Guidelines report can be downloaded for free on the NADA Used Car Guide速 website at www.nada.com/b2b .
About NADA Used Car Guide
Since 1933, NADA Used Car Guide 速 has earned its reputation as the leading provider of vehicle valuation products, services and information to businesses throughout the United States and worldwide. Its editorial team collects and analyzes over 1 million combined automotive and truck wholesale and retail transactions per month. Its guidebooks, auction data, analysis and data solutions offer automotive/truck, finance, insurance and government professionals the timely information and reliable solutions they need to make better business decisions. Visit nada.com/b2b to learn more. NADA Used Car Guide 速 is licensed by J.D. Power and Associates.
